column4: grr ok so i used storage device manager to try and mount a ntfs...i typed things wrong..and it's now looking for the volume at /media/g:\ and mount can not find it labeled as such? what do i do..???
grr ok so i used storage device manager to try and mount a ntfs...i typed things wrong..and it's now looking for the volume at /media/g:\ and mount can not find it labeled as such? what do i do..???

Backtrack isn't an official variant of Ubuntu, they make their own changes and use their own repository.  Its not just that we don't want to support it, we can't.  The backtrack folks are the most knowledable about what changes they make.
